text/x-wiki
A '''Shield of the High One''' was an honorary title granted to worshipers of [[Azuth]] who served the [[Church of Azuth|church]] by either destroying a magical monstrosity or imbalance.
document_data.Activities: These individuals were given a minor [[magic item]] as a reward as well as a secret pass phrase that would grant them magical healing, small loans, and other forms of aid from any shrine or temple dedicated to Azuth.
